title: Under Heavy (Full Movie) Action War Drama

sources.title: Under Heavy (Full Movie) Action War Drama
sources.description:
A group of Marines return to Vietnam with a news crew to relive their tragic war experiences. 

Directed by Sidney J. Furie
2001
Starring Casper Van Dien, Jaimz Woolvett, Bobby Hosea 
Edited for Youtube ad friendly standards
